about.references:
@article{Antao2008,
    author = "Antao, S.M. and Hassan, I. and Jun, Wang and Lee, L.P. and Toby, B.H.",
    title = "State-of-the-art high-resolution powder X-ray diffraction (HRPXRD) illustrated with Rietveld structure refinement of quartz, sodalite, tremolite and meionite",
    journal = "Canadian Mineralogist",
    year = "2008",
    volume = "46",
    pages = "1501-1509",
    ASTM_id = "CAMIA6"
}

@article{Ogata1987,
    author = "Ogata, K. and Takeuchi, Y. and Kudoh, Y.",
    title = "Structure of alpha-quartz as a function of temperature and pressure",
    journal = "Zeitschrift fuer Kristallographie (1979-2010)",
    year = "1987",
    volume = "179",
    pages = "403-413",
    ASTM_id = "ZEKRDZ"
}

@article{Fujishita2010,
    author = "Fujishita, H. and Hayashi, M. and Kanai, T. and Yamada, T. and Igawa, N. and Kihara, K.",
    title = "Study of quantum effects on atomic displacements in quartz",
    journal = "Journal of Physics and Chemistry of Solids",
    year = "2010",
    volume = "71",
    pages = "1285-1289",
    ASTM_id = "JPCSAW"
}

@article{d'Amour1979,
    author = "d'Amour, H. and Denner, W. and Schulz, H.",
    title = "Structure determination of alpha-quartz up to 68*10exp8 Pa",
    journal = "Acta Crystallographica B (24,1968-38,1982)",

    volume = "35",
    pages = "550-555",
    ASTM_id = "ACBCAR"
}

@article{Martinez2006,

    title = "Rietveld refinement of amorphous Si O2 prepared via sol-gel method",

    volume = "60",

    ASTM_id = "MLETDJ"
}

}

}

    title = "Materials Data on SiO2 (SG:154) by Materials Project",
